data.title: Carine Roitfeld Talks About Leaving Condé Nast
data.meta_description: Carine Roitfeld hasn’t slowed down since ending her decade-long editorship of Vogue Paris last year. She launched the magazine CR Fashion Book, collaborated with MAC on a cosmetics collection, was named the first global fashion director of Harper’s Bazaar and became a grandmother.
data.text:
Carine Roitfeld hasn’t slowed down since ending her decade-long editorship of Vogue Paris last year. She launched the magazine CR Fashion Book, collaborated with MAC on a cosmetics collection, was named the first global fashion director of Harper’s Bazaar and became a grandmother. Here, the onetime queen of “porno chic” talks about growing up, balancing jobs and working with reality stars.

At Vogue Paris, you were known for having a very erotic sensibility, but the first issue of CR had a mother and child on the cover, and the second issue (on newsstands) has a ballet theme.

WORK SMARTER - LEARN, GROW AND BE INSPIRED.
